mapper.select: /* [ToteScanMapper.xml] selectToteScan */ SELECT TOTE_ID AS toteId, WAREHOUSE_KEY AS warehouseKey, PICKING_TYPE AS pickingType, ALLOC_TYPE AS processType, QPS_NUM AS qpsUnitNo, FAC_EQP_ID AS facEqpId, FAC_EQP_NM AS facEqpName, SUBSTR(TOTE_INITIAL_SCAN_YMD,1,8) AS toteScanDate, SUBSTR(TOTE_INITIAL_SCAN_YMD,9,6) AS toteScanTime, WIF_PICK_TOTE_HDR_SEQ AS toteUniqueNo, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS insertedDate, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS') AS insertedTime, CREATED_USER AS insertedUser FROM o_wcs.TB_WIF_PICK_TOTE_HDR WHERE TOTE_INITIAL_SCAN_YN = 'Y' AND TOTE_SCAN_IF_YN = 'N' ORDER BY WIF_PICK_TOTE_HDR_SEQ ASC
